hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:a man fell from his mount and it trampled him. The Messenger of Allah said: "Wash him with water and lotus leaves, and he should be shrouded in two clothes, leaving his head and face bare, for he will be raised on the Day of Resurrection reciting the Talbiyah."(sahih)

chapter.eng-name: Pilgrim in Ihram covering his face and head
